insert into base_advice(id,hosp_code, code, name,other_name, type_code, technology_code, price, unit_code, out_dept_code, in_dept_code, biz_type, biz_code, container_code, specimen_code, use_scope_code, dept_code, doctor_level_code, opeartion_code, insure_list_code, gender_code, min_age, max_age, is_cost, is_stop_same, is_stop_same_not, is_stop_myself, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,oper_disease_icd9) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.code}, #{item.name},#{item.otherName}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.technologyCode}, #{item.price}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.outDeptCode}, #{item.inDeptCode}, #{item.bizType}, #{item.bizCode}, #{item.containerCode}, #{item.specimenCode}, #{item.useScopeCode}, #{item.deptCode}, #{item.doctorLevelCode}, #{item.opeartionCode}, #{item.insureListCode}, #{item.genderCode}, #{item.minAge}, #{item.maxAge}, #{item.isCost}, #{item.isStopSame}, #{item.isStopSameNot}, #{item.isStopMyself}, #{item.pym}, #{item.wbm},'1', #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime},#{item.operDiseaseIcd9})
mapper.select: select * from base_advice where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and code=#{code}

select * from (select ma.merge_id,max(ov.dept_name ) dept_name,max(ov.visit_no ) visit_no,max( ba.container_code ) container_code, max( ba.specimen_code ) specimen_code, GROUP_CONCAT( opd.content SEPARATOR ',' ) content, max( ma.document_sta ) document_sta,max(ma.apply_no ) apply_no, max( ov.NAME ) `name`,max( ov.gender_code ) gender_code, max( ov.age ) age,max( ov.age_unit_code ) age_unit_code, max(ma.crte_time ) crte_time, max(ma.bar_code ) bar_code, max(ba.technology_code) technology_code from medic_apply ma JOIN outpt_prescribe_detail opd ON Convert(ma.opd_id USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = opd.id AND Convert(ma.hosp_code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci= opd.hosp_code JOIN base_advice ba ON opd.item_id = ba.id AND opd.hosp_code = ba.hosp_code JOIN outpt_visit ov ON ma.visit_id = ov.id AND ma.hosp_code = ov.hosp_code JOIN outpt_prescribe op ON opd.op_id = op.id AND op.hosp_code = opd.hosp_code where op.is_settle ='1' and ma.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and ov.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and ov.dept_id = #{deptId}
and ov.visit_no like concat('%',#{visitNo},'%')
and ma.crte_time >= DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL 0 day)
and ma.crte_time < DATE_ADD(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 day)
and 1=2
and ma.print_time is null
and ma.print_time is not null
and (document_sta is null or document_sta in
#{item}
)
group by ma.merge_id
union all SELECT ma.merge_id, max(iv.in_dept_name) AS dept_name, max(iv.in_no) AS visit_no, max(ba.container_code) container_code, max(ba.specimen_code) specimen_code, GROUP_CONCAT(ia.content separator ',') content, max(ma.document_sta) document_sta, max(ma.apply_no) apply_no, max(iv.name) name, max(iv.gender_code) gender_code, max(iv.age) age, max(iv.age_unit_code) age_unit_code, max(ma.crte_time) crte_time, max(ma.bar_code) bar_code, max(ba.technology_code) technology_code FROM
medic_apply ma join inpt_advice ia on ma.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code and ma.order_no = ia.order_no join inpt_advice_detail iad on ia.id = iad.ia_id and ia.hosp_code = iad.hosp_code join base_advice ba on iad.hosp_code = ba.hosp_code and iad.ba_id = ba.id and ba.type_code = '3' join inpt_visit iv on iad.hosp_code = iv.hosp_code and iad.visit_id = iv.id
where ma.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and iv.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and iv.in_dept_id = #{deptId}
and iv.in_no like concat('%',#{visitNo},'%')
and ma.crte_time >= DATE_ADD(#{startDate},INTERVAL 0 day)
and ma.crte_time < DATE_ADD(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 day)
and 1=2
and ma.print_time is null
and ma.print_time is not null
and (document_sta is null or document_sta in
#{item}
)
group by ma.merge_id ) tab1 order by tab1.crte_time desc
